_header: This wicked man couth none evil he wrought
_description: The evil man — four couplets in a Latin exemplum

BodLatTheD1.First Lines:
this wikide man coude non euel he wrowhtne in his dedes god drede
                    he nouȝht…
BodLatTheD1.Last Lines:
…[ ] his bede on wyckidnesse he þouht[ ] to ward ill
                    werkys & malise dred he nought
